attributes.title: Worst app ever!!🖕🏼🖕🏼
attributes.review: So i was bored the other day and i got this app, and i was looking through the pictures and one of the pictures said, “make america great again” so i was like “there's ➡️a lot😮of people🙋‍♂️🙋‍♀️in amer~i~c~u~h🇺🇸🌎, in amer~i~c~u~hhh🇺🇸🌎,(aaaah🤩) over 300 million people 🙋‍♂️🙋‍♀️in amer~i~c~u~h s” so i decided i wanted to save the world by making america great again!!! ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ  after the i downloaded the app, nothing happened. VERY disappointed. I just wanted to save the world, ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ this app did not let me!! I hope this app gets taken off the appstore because it’s not making america great!!!!!💔

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: this app took a whole month to download. It took up all my storage space, and worst of all its such bad quality. I thought I would have been worth it but no the app glitches so I can only go on it for 10 seconds before it kicks me out. Not to even mention why is the app orange when I open it like I know the Trump orange and all but why?? If I could I would give this app 0 stars because it is so hard to use and navigate thru. Anyways I think you guys should take this off the App Store it is so unnecessary. Thank you.

attributes.title: I dislike this app🙅🏽🧢
attributes.review: So I decided I would vote for trumpet and I got the app my mom found out and she then proceeds to slap the stuffing out of me?? Anyway I am now seeing a dermatologist which I don’t know what or who that is but anyway I need help because I don’t why but I went to school voted for trumpet I got home and and....my dog was found burnt so we ate her anyway tho our house then somehow gets millions maybe billions of locus to invade the house and which trumpet then pulls up to my house and I slapped him *BANG *BANG and he’s knocked out LOL LOL 😂 LOL this whole story is fake I don’t like mr Donald Duck j trumpet and I HATE THIS APP 😂😂😂

attributes.title: BLACK LIVES MATTER
attributes.review: When i downloaded this app, i just wanted to support our president, but it took about 4 hours to download? when it was finally ready i clicked into it (mind you, i was on the toilet at the time) wasps flew up from my toilet and started going inside me! i got up and ran out of my bathroom, but then my phone blew up! my dog came running in then started projectile vomiting in my mouth, then she started pooping out her intestines then chocking me with them! oranges started chanting with my dog something latin and jumping around me, i’ve been cursed ever since. TERRIBLE APP.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER 😡😡😡
attributes.review: when i first tried downloading the app i had to wait for over THREE HOURS just to verify the app to be downloaded. then when it finally decided to download my whole screen went white and it crashed my phone! finally the app download (AFTER ANOTHER 3 HOURS) and it made me login like 4 different times because it kept saying there was an error. not to mention the music that was playing the whole time was absolutely DEAFENING to not only me but my entire household!! would NOT recommend, if i could give it negative stars I WOULD!

attributes.title: what in tarnation mr trumpet
attributes.review: many had been recommending for me to download this app in order to maximize support for my daddy donald but was met with sever disappointment! 😞 not only did the app take HOURS to load but it would also continuously crash over and over. this app has the least efficient performance i have seen in a while.😤 i will be making complaints on my facebook page making sure no other innocent being comes in frustration with such a difficult app😡. mr trumpy poo we know you’re better than this. #improveplease 🙄

attributes.title: Summoned Lucifer!
attributes.review: All I was looking forward to doing was supporting my president! As soon as I opened the app, my entire room got unbearably hot and a fire shot up from the floor. A large piece of my floor fell through and the devil himself rose up and told me to delete the app. I was told if I didn’t, he’d drag me down there to spend all eternity with him. I closed the app and Lucifer disappeared along with the fire. I can’t even support my president without the devil threatening to bring me to the depths of hell! I’m so disappointed in this app and this is truly an outrage! I’m deleting the app NOW. Terrible!

attributes.title: worst app EVER😡
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever. Don’t download it. As soon as the app was downloaded on my phone my entire family died of corona and my house burned down. Reading the information on the app has now made me clinically depressed and I have lost so many brain cells that I will have to get brain surgery. After only 5 hours of the app being installed, my entire bank account was drained. Then I was mugged while looking at the app on my phone and the mugger proceeded to amputate my left leg so now I can’t walk properly. This app ruined my life I don’t recommend.

attributes.title: ALMOST DIED!!!(not clickbait!!)😨😨
attributes.review:
as i was sleeping 💤 🛌 i was visited ✈️ by our Lord orange 🍊😱😱 he told me to download this app 📱🤯 and so as i woke🤗 from my peaceful ☮️ slumber 😴 i downloaded it😁🤟. It took 5 DAYS to download😡🤬 and as soon as i opened it it killed my brother🙀💀 and posessed my sisters goldfish 😿🤟 dont get me wrong lord orange💖🍊ur gorgeous stick on pasty hair is so fresh😚😻🦩🌞💐and your bright orange 🧡tan is soooo seggsy💕💕💞💗💗💞but tbh when my sisters 👯‍♀️ posessed goldfish 🐟🐟doxxed us i kinda lost a bit of my cult like love for u🥺🥺😘😘u also dont have as fat of an a$$🤑🤑 as i thot u did🥱🧐 
p.s. girl pls tell me what tan u use🐙😋😁u look so good girlie🥰❤️🧡💛💚💙💜

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: I have heard about some minor problems when I downloaded this app but I decided to take my risks to support murica and it’s leading orangutan. When I signed in to support the campaign, this horrible music played and summoned an army of fire ants in my neighborhood. The ant army proceeded to march into my house even after I did everything to try and stop them. The red army took my dog and carried her out the door to sacrifice her to their orange ramen haired leader as my family and I watched in utter despair and horror. I do not recommend this app especially if you have a small child, cat and or dog.
